import math
tests = int(input())
for i in range(tests):
    num = int(input())
    end = math.floor(num ** 0.5) + 1
    diff = num - 1
    for j in range(1, end):
        other = num / j
        if other == int(other) and diff > abs(other - j):
            diff = int(abs(other - j))
    print(diff)

import math
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = int(math.sqrt(n))
    b = True
    while b:
        if n % a == 0:
            dif = abs(a - n / a)
            b = False
        a -= 1
    print(int(dif))

import math
T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    L = int(math.sqrt(N))
    F = True
    while F:
        if N % L == 0:
            dif = abs(L - N / L)
            F = False
        L -= 1
    print(int(dif))

import math
T = int(input())
for tc in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    L = int(math.sqrt(N))
    Flag = True
    while Flag:
        if N % L == 0:
            dif = abs(L - N / L)
            Flag = False
        L -= 1
    print(int(dif))

import math
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    k = int(input())
    r = math.sqrt(k)
    p = math.floor(math.sqrt(k))
    if r == p:
        print(0)
    else:
        l = []
        f = []
        for i in range(1, p + 1):
            if k % i == 0:
                x = k // i
                y = abs(x - i)
                f.append(y)
        print(min(f))

import math
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    factors = []
    ss = math.sqrt(n)
    sq = math.ceil(ss)
    for i in range(1, sq + 1):
        if n % i == 0:
            rr = n // i
            tt = (i, rr)
            factors.append(tt)
    diff = []
    for (a, b) in factors:
        diff.append(abs(a - b))
    diff.sort()
    print(diff[0])

import math
T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    x = 0
    l = []
    N = int(input())
    for i in range(1, int(math.sqrt(N)) + 1):
        if N % i == 0:
            x = N / i - i
            l += [x]
    l.sort()
    print(int(l[0]))
